summary: Pegasus is a famous creature from Greek mythology, a beautiful white horse with wings. He was born from the blood of a monster called Medusa. Pegasus could fly up to heaven and was trusted by the god Zeus. He helped a hero named Bellerophon defeat a dangerous monster, but later, they both faced Zeus's wrath. Pegasus is still seen in the night sky as a constellation and has been an inspiration for artists for centuries.
title: Pegasus
